trans-unit.target: An error occurred while synchronizing the offer %offer%:\n%error%

trans-unit.source: Zakończenie ofert %offers% z powodu braku produktów na magazynie
trans-unit.target: Completion of offers number %offers% due to a lack of products in stock

trans-unit.source: Wznowienie ofert %offers% z powodu ponownej dostępności produktów na magazynie
trans-unit.target: Resumption of offer number %offers% due to the re-availability of products in stock
